tags.name: time-ticker
tags.jsDoc:
/**
 * @element time-ticker
 * @event tick - Dipatched every time timer goes off

attributes.name: items
attributes.description:
Items to rotate through.
Sets property repeat to the number of items (length)
Attribute support (must be in JSON format)

attributes.name: loop
attributes.description: Indicates whether should cycle or stop

properties.name: evCount
properties.description: Tracks how many times each event type was called.
